member.name: T:Fastenshtein.AutoCompleteLevenshtein
member.summary: Measures the difference between two strings. Uses the Levenshtein string difference algorithm.

member.name: M:Fastenshtein.AutoCompleteLevenshtein.Distance(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compares the two strings and returns a measure of their summarily with 0 being an exact match.
member.param: the incomplete value entered by the user
the value to compare value1 against
member.returns: 0 exact match less a positive value, lower the value the best match
